Text: Nice Extol. I will seed this for a while as soon as I get it.

Too bad, I wished that this would have included the followin rare extol tracks: Vicious Intent, Christianity Misunderstood and Seek the Righteous ...They aren't available anywhere, not as files nor on any cd. I wish I lived in norway, I think those tracks would be available there in some music shop.

I got Christianity Misunderstood and Seek the Righteous ! The first one is really FANTASTIC!! Do any one know if they got more albums or songs? and can someone say to me a band thats is simmilar to extol because i love christian metal!!!!!!!
If you like christian metal like extol, you should check out Crimson Moonlight, The Agony Scene, Antestor, Demon Hunter, Drottnar and Pantokrator. They are really great.
